subsc: Central government administration,Public administration- Other social services

abstracts.cdata!:
The Executive Directors approved the
            Public Finance and Social Progress Development Policy Loan
            (DPL) to the Republic of El Salvador in the amount of US$100
            million on the payment terms and conditions set out in the
            President's Memorandum (R2011-0112). Directors
            expressed support for the DPL and acknowledged its focus on
            creating fiscal space for social expenditures and enhancing
            the protection and inclusion of vulnerable groups. They
            noted that the Bank's support is critical following the
            2009 crisis that hit El Salvador's economy and set back
            the social progress achieved in previous years. Looking
            ahead and noting uncertainties for growth and deficits,
            Directors highlighted the importance of tax system reforms.
            Directors welcomed the consultative and participatory manner
            in which the program was prepared. Finally, aid coordination
            and continued consultations and consensus building to
            facilitate the implementation of the program were also encouraged.
